name: Angelina
bio: Hi! I’m an ECE 2T4+1 minoring in Artificial Intelligence, Music Performance and Near and Middle Eastern Civilizations. I am specifically interested in the applications of AI in the field of Music Informatics.

name: Sophie
bio: Hello! My name is Sophie, an EngSci 2T3+PEY majoring in machine intelligence and minoring in robotics and mechatronics. A fun fact about me is that I’m on a cooking adventure - I’ve been experimenting with cooking new dishes.New applications of AI are constantly on the rise, but several limitations to the technology exist. As one of the co-presidents of TMI, I hope to educate others on these aspects to achieve proper and trustworthy uses of machine learning.

name: Jasmine
bio: Hi everyone! I'm Jasmine, an EngSci 2T3 + PEY majoring in Machine Intelligence. Outside of academics, I enjoy playing piano and listening to musicals.The course Engineering and Society opened my eyes to the political and social consequences of technology. I founded TMI (then called EPAI) because I wanted to create a community of students at UofT passionate about ethical AI and trustworthy machine learning.For my title in the club, can you put ML Model Stealing Project Lead + Student Advisor (very long, but I'd prefer for project lead to be first!) thank you!

name: Calum
bio: I'm Calum, a EngSci 2T4 + PEY majoring in ECE with a minor in AI. I'm currently on PEY with Red Hat where I work on distributed event driven platforms with Knative Eventing. I am passionate about Open Source, and I strongly believe in building in the open by default. I am interested in the intersection of algorithms, control theory, distributed systems, and machine learning.As AI and Big Data become pervasive, we need to work to protect the privacy of individuals. I joined TMI to work towards protecting individuals privacy through machine unlearning techniques, and to learn more about the ethics behind AI.

name: Dian
bio: My program is Computer Science and Statistics,  I’m in 3rd yr and my fun fact is I’ve had 10 teeth removed

name: Mirvat
bio: Hi, I’m Mirvat and I’m a 2T4+PEY majoring in Chemical Engineering with a minor in Environmental Engineering. Outside of school, I like to read mystery novels and watch movies with crazy plot twists. I love surprises!. I believe Artificial Intelligence is the future, and my personal interest in its ethics brought me to TMI. I’m excited to learn about the modern-day ethical dilemmas emerging in the face of technological revolution.

name: Matthew
bio: Medicine Year: 2 Fun Fact: Matthew enjoys playing chess casually
